title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2, the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project option is not displayed.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Select P1.
2. Select P2.
3. Check the available menu options for opening and closing a project.
